name: DobbyxEscape: Pirate Adventure
description:
DobbyxEscape: Pirate Adventure


Ahoy, Me Hearties!

Tommy wants to be a pirate when he grows up!

With the help of a Blue Moon, the tap of his magic wand and his great great great grandfather's pirate hat, his dreams come true!

Follow Tommy on the adventure of a lifetime where he meets the legendary pirate Blackbeard!

All Hands Ahoy!



Features:


  • Room Escape game!
  • Six locations to discover!
  • Beautiful graphics bring the game to life!
  • Many items to collect and puzzles to solve!
  • Fun soundtrack and sound effects!
